coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint wax stamp on the peel reads "Grown by the dragons of the DSG Farmer's Guild."
coreAttributes.name: Red Dragonfruit
coreAttributes.description: Named for the scaly, spiky leaves on its exterior, this rare fruit was first cultivated by dragon-morphs centuries ago. Legend has it that every hidden grove where it now grows was once a dragon's home. This variety grows best in poor, clay heavy soils.
